description: An Aztecan sorcerer. He borrows the appearance of Unabara Mitsuki, the Tokiwadai Middle School principal`s grandson. A certain group outside Academy City became aware of the growing "Kamijou Faction", so they sent him as a spy. Borrowing the appearance of Mitsuki, he attempts to become closer to Misaka Mikoto, but he ends up falling in love with her. After he loses the battle with Touma, he makes him promise to protect Mikoto and the world around her. He uses a copy of the obsidian spearhead of the god Tlahuizcalpantecuhtli, which reflects light from Venus destroying anything the light falls upon. It is later revealed that he is member of the GROUP.
name: Etzali
